tooltip.brezhonegdelight.chouchen.shift_: §lChouchen§r is an alcoholic Breton beverage, made with honey and water, as well as apples traditionally.
tooltip.brezhonegdelight.kouign_amann.sh: §lKouign-Amann§r is a greasy Breton pastry made with layers of butter and sugar. It originates from the city of Douarnenez in the 19th century.
tooltip.brezhonegdelight.kig_ha_farz.shi: §lKig Ha Farz§r is a Breton dish similar to the French "pot-au-feu", made with meat, broth and buckwheat pudding.
